kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: Opening browser 'Chrome' to base url 'https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/'.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.msg: Clicking link 'css:ul[class='top-menu'] a[href='/computers']'.
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.msg: Clicking link 'css:h2[class='title'] a[href='/desktops']'.
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id:products-orderby' by value https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/desktops?orderby=5.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id:products-pagesize' by value https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/desktops?orderby=5&pagesize=4.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id:products-viewmode' by value https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/desktops?orderby=5&pagesize=4&viewmode=grid.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.msg: Clicking link '//a[normalize-space()='Build your own cheap computer']'.
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://div[@class='product-name']//child::h1[normalize-space()='Build your own cheap computer']' contains exact text 'Build your own cheap computer'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
